title: A psalme of prayer and praise for the prosperous and good estate of our soueraigne lord the King, his royall progeny, and the whole estate of his Maiesties dominions and people drawne from the fountaine of faith, for the priuate vse of the poore orphanes in Christs Hospitall; or any true Christian, wishing wealth and peace to Sion.
author: Christ's Hospital (London, England)
